channel.title: Steam Deck Guide
channel.description: make the most of your Steam Deck

item.title: BIG update to Proton coming (Steam Deck / Linux)
item.content:encoded: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/wiki/ChangelogAvailable in Proton Experimental (as of 2023/01/06):* Now playable: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4, Atelier Meruru, ToGather:Island, WARRIORS OROCHI 3 Ultimate Definitive Edition, Exceed - Gun Bullet Children, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, Gungrave G.O.R.E.* Fix Life is Strange Remastered crashing at the end of chapter 2.* Fix Alt+Tab not working on Gnome 43.* Improve force feedback compatibility for BeamNG and Forza Horizon 5.* Fix regression with Mortal Combat X performance.* Fix OpenGL launch option for Youropa.* Fix video playback speed/stutter in METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN.* Halo Infinite now gets in-game. Many graphical artifacts still known on NVIDIA, minor artifacts expected on Deck and AMD Desktop.* Fix raytracing in Crysis Remastered.* Enable nvapi for many games.* Update file distribution method to save disk space.* Update dxvk to include the latest development work.* Update vkd3d-proton to include the latest development work.;Video

item.title: GameCube and Wii emulator Dolphin got a big speed boost for Steam Deck
item.content:encoded: The Dolphin emulator for GameCube and Wii games recently had a progress report showing the emulator is doing well, with lots of new features and performance improvements. The team has been using the Vulkan graphics API for better memory management and optimized it specifically for the Steam Deck, resulting in big performance gains for Super Mario Galaxy (85 FPS to 140 FPS in simulated testing). Users can expect better performance across the board, especially for those using Steam Deck.If you installed Dolphin via flatpak you'll need to go back to desktop mode and update.Full article: https://www.gamingonlinux.com/2023/01/gamecube-and-wii-emulator-dolphin-got-a-big-speed-boost-for-steam-deck/
